quote: Don't let them drag you down by rumors. Just go with what you believe in. – Michael Jordan
fact: THE MOST UNUSUAL CANNONBALL: On two occasions, Miss `Rita Thunderbird` remained inside the cannon despite a lot of gunpowder encouragement to do otherwise. She performed in a gold lamé bikini and on one of the two occasions (1977) Miss Thunderbird remained lodged in the cannon, while her bra was shot across the Thames River.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Geology rocks, but Geography is where it's at!
